title: THIS LOOSE-FIT WINDBREAKER IS MADE IN PART WITH RECYCLED MATERIALS.
details: This product is made with at least 70% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

title: TRIED-AND-TRUE SHOES WITH MODERN COLORS
details: Shake up the iconic adidas Gazelle shoes with some playful colors. Originally released as an indoor soccer trainer, this stylish silhouette has gone on to shine in the fashion world. This pair shows off bold colors offset by the white laces, eyestay, tongue and lining.

title: RUNNING-INSPIRED SHOES WITH A MODERN SHAPE AND STYLE.
details: You like to be one step ahead. Blending retro vibes with modern design, these adidas Retropy F2 Shoes are right there with you. Rooted in '80s running style, they show off a layered material-mix upper. The sleek shape and thick EVA midsole make them ideal for today.

title: A 3-STRIPES TEE DESIGNED TO MOVE, MADE IN PART WITH RECYCLED MATERIALS.
details: Cardio to arm day, this adidas base-layer t-shirt will help you power through. Break your personal records in total comfort, thanks to mesh on the upper back where you need it most and moisture-absorbing AEROREADY. Everything about this training tee is made so you can move freely, like a dynamic shape and a super-stretchy fabric.

title: 3-STRIPES TIGHTS FOR INTENSE WORKOUTS, MADE IN PART WITH RECYCLED MATERIALS.
details: Let nothing slow you down. Move as freely as you need to during intense sessions when you wear these base-layer tights. Lunge, kick and hit the cardio hard in total comfort, thanks to a 3D sculpted pouch. Mesh details and moisture-absorbing adidas AEROREADY keep you dry and comfortable, so you can work out without distractions.

title: Teal Embroidered Kurta Set With Gota Patti Detail
details:
Color: Teal
      Fabric: Cotton silk
      Work: Embroidery
      Closure: None
      Neck Line: V-Neckline
      Sleeves: 3/4th Sleeve
      Can Can: No
      Pack Contains: 1 kurta, 1 pant, 1 dupatta
      Manufactured / Packed by : Suarabhakti Goods Pvt ltd
      There may be slight color variation depending on the screen one is looking through and once you receive the product.
      Inclusive of all taxes
      Perfect choice for celebratory occasions, this teal set exudes and elegant and classy vibe.
      Accentuated with gota patti trims and sparkly sequin, the kurta features a V-neckline and three-quarter sleeves.
      Paired with pants and a contrast dupatta, this cotton silk outfit lends a comfortable fit.
      Gentle wash required.
      Avoid mothball use.
      Slight variation in color is possible due to digital photography.
      Being rewarded as the most trusted brand our customers too believe we deliver the same styles as promised on the website.
